cache-delete.desc:
Remove environement cache from directory cache 
 	 --env: Environment name (DEV, PROD, PREPROD, ALL)

assets-manager.desc:
Manage project assets 
 	 --move : Move project to an other location  
 	 --symlink (must with --move option) Symbolic link will be created 
 	 --clear : clear all web assets 
 	 --env: Environment name (DEV, PROD, PREPROD, ALL)
